question: Which of the following statements is incorrect?
option1: A person can be appointed as cabinet minister even if he is not a member of legislature at the time of appointment
option2: Cabinet is headed by the head of the State
option3: The Council of Ministers are collectively responsible to the Lok Sabha
option4: The lower house of the Parliament can be dissolved by the President
answer: Cabinet is headed by the head of the State
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because Cabinet is headed by Prime Minister who is the head of government. Head of State is President. All other statements are correct
